alert.note: Alert for Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 21 at 4:55AM AKDT until October 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Central Arctic Plains and Central Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Arctic Plains; Central Brooks Range
